title: From Steel to Leather: An Entrepreneur's Story
teaser: In college, Ralphy Dominguez was a straight-A student, a natural leathersmith and a drug kingpin. His knack for business led to a $2 million cocaine ring and ended in a 3-year stint in federal prison.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
